statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData
SELECT project_name, traffic_volume FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE project_location = 'New York'
SELECT project_id, project_name, average_speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY average_speed DESC
SELECT project_location, project_name, traffic_volume FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE average_speed < 50 ORDER BY project_location ASC
SELECT project_id, traffic_volume, average_speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT project_name, traffic_volume FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT project_name, average_speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE project_location = 'City Center' AND average_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE traffic_volume BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY project_location ASC, average_speed DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE project_location LIKE 'Highway%' AND average_speed < 60;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects, AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_traffic FROM TrafficFlowData GROUP BY project_location HAVING avg_traffic > 150 ORDER BY avg_traffic DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT traffic_volume, timestamp FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT project_id, avg_speed FROM traffic_analysis WHERE project_id = 123;
SELECT max_speed, avg_speed FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_id, speed, traffic_volume FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data td JOIN traffic_analysis ta ON td.timestamp = ta.analysis_timestamp WHERE td.speed > ta.avg_speed;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM traffic_analysis GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE avg_speed BETWEEN 60.5 AND 70.5 ORDER BY analysis_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData;
SELECT project_name, speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location, incident_type FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 AND average_speed < 60 ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT project_id, date_time, average_speed FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE average_speed BETWEEN 40 AND 70 ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, date_time, vehicle_type FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM TrafficFlowData WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM TrafficFlowData GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_records > 100;
SELECT project_name, incident_type, location FROM TrafficFlowData JOIN TrafficIncidents ON TrafficFlowData.location = TrafficIncidents.location WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data;
SELECT id, project_id, speed, timestamp FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT project_name, project_location, start_date, completion_date FROM project_details WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT road_name, road_type, length FROM road_network WHERE length > 10 ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, vehicle_count, sensor_status FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_status = 'active' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM project_details WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT road_name, length, construction_year FROM road_network WHERE length > 5 ORDER BY construction_year ASC
SELECT sensor_id, vehicle_count FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_status = 'active'
SELECT t.vehicle_type, s.vehicle_count FROM traffic_flow_data t JOIN sensor_data s ON t.id = s.road_id
SELECT * FROM traffic_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location, traffic_volume FROM traffic_sensor_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM road_network WHERE surface_type = 'Asphalt' AND construction_year > 2010 ORDER BY length_miles DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT road_name, length_miles FROM road_network ORDER BY length_miles ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM traffic_sensor_data WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_sensor_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT road_id, road_name, length_miles FROM road_network WHERE construction_year < 2000 ORDER BY length_miles DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND reported_at > '2022-01-01 12:00:00' ORDER BY reported_at ASC
SELECT camera_id, location, last_updated FROM traffic_camera_feed WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
